author: Special Correspondent
text:
Check-posts have been set up at the borders of the district with a view to ensuring free and fair poll during the ensuing Assembly elections, said T. Karikalan, District Collector.

Addressing officials at a meeting convened here on Friday, Mr. Karikalan said that joint efforts would be taken by the police and revenue officials for checking unauthorised transit of cash, valuables or gifts by vehicles. A round-the-clock vigil was being kept at these check-posts, he added. This apart, the district administration had constituted six flying squads. The Collector advised the officials to execute the guidelines stipulated in the model code of conduct.

The Collector explained the procedure to be followed while checking the vehicles, so that the procedures would involve cooperation from the occupants of the vehicle.
title: Seven check-posts set up in Karaikal border
